title: Did Hillary Clinton donate $700,000 to the FBI Director's wife's campaign?
subtitle: Andrew McCabe did not have any supervision over the investigation of Minister Clinton's e-mail server while his wife was running for political office.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Hillary Clinton illegally donated $700,000 to the FBI Director's wife's political campaign, which was overseeing an investigation into her use of a private e-mail server.
